Recommended Beers.Description: Anchor Steam is a distinctive California Common beer with a smooth malty sweetness and a crisp finish, making it perfect with burgers, grilled sausages, and cheese
Killians Irish Red is a malty and smooth Irish Red Ale with a hint of caramel sweetness and a slightly bitter finish, making it a perfect match with steak, grilled vegetables, or burgers
Fat Tire Amber Ale is a smooth amber ale with a malty caramel flavor and a slight hoppy finish, perfect with burgers, chicken, and grilled vegetables
